scripts.test: npm run test:api && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:api: docker compose -p test-api -f docker-compose.test.yml build && docker compose -p test-api -f docker-compose.test.yml run --rm api; exitcode=$?; docker compose -p test-api -f docker-compose.test.yml down; exit ${exitcode}
scripts.test:e2e: NODE_ENV=test docker compose -p test-e2e -f docker-compose-e2e.test.yml build && docker compose -p test-e2e -f docker-compose-e2e.test.yml run --rm cypress; exitcode=$?; docker compose -p test-e2e -f docker-compose-e2e.test.yml down; exit ${exitcode}
scripts.build: npm run build:api && npm run build:front-admin && npm run build:front && npm run build:package
scripts.build:api: cd api && npm i && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build:front-admin: cd front-admin && npm i && npm i --dev && npm run build && mv dist/browser ../api/dist/front-admin && cd ..
scripts.build:front: cd front && npm i && npm i --dev && npm run build && mv dist/browser ../api/dist/front && cd ..
